DOC.brief_summary: This study is to find out how the subject's body processes and reacts to the study drug, and to find out how long it remains in the subjects system after one dose. Subjects with varying degrees of liver function are being asked to participate in this study. Study results from subjects with normal liver function will be compared with study results from subjects with impaired liver function.
DOC.criteria: Healthy Subjects, Child Pugh A and Child Pugh B Liver Disease Patients.
